## EditorApi.setPlaceholder() method

Set the text to be shown to the user when the editor value is empty

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setPlaceholder(placeholder: string | undefined): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type |
|  --- | --- |
|  placeholder | string \| undefined |
